entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
